{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3499199,"name":"","username":"star_E","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/898d66/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-01T19:53:29.933Z","cooked":"

Hi! I’m completely new to FRC (and this forum) and I’m currently learning how to program our cameras using the PhotonVision system for our competition bot. Me and my mentor have been studying the documentation on PhotonVision’s website and have some basic questions about the design/architecture. We are planning to use an Orange Pi 5 running the PhotonVision image to take some of the processing off of the roboRIO. What sort of code should be deployed where? it’s kinda difficult to write code when we don’t know where to put it in VSCode. Thanks!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2025-02-01T19:53:29.933Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":25,"reads":142,"readers_count":141,"score":153.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":484692,"topic_slug":"photonvision-code-architecture-for-orange-pi-5","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":72050,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"(Dork)"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-code-architecture-for-orange-pi-5/484692/1","custom_user_title":"(Dork)","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3499338,"name":"Chadfrom7226","username":"Chadfrom7226","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/chadfrom7226/{size}/113429_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-01T22:00:08.477Z","cooked":"

Deploy the photonvision on the OrangePi 5 (there is a github - make sure you use the correct firmware made for your version of the orangepi 5)

Then, add the vision code. This is the hard part - I recommend using the AdvantageKit Vision template

docs.advantagekit.org

Vision Template | AdvantageKit

The vision template project provides a starting point for creating a high-performance vision or pose estimation system compatible with AdvantageKit's deterministic log replay. It includes support for the following features:

Or at least copy the relevant code into your existing project

What drivetrain are you running?

our swerve drive code is in java. we have rev thru-hole encoders, rev flex for drive motors, rev neo for turn motors. as for the gyro its a NavX 2.
